mean_en: the fact of behaving according to a particular rule, etc., or of following a particular set of beliefs, or a fixed way of doing something
sentence: Adherence to the traffic rules is important to stay safe on the roads!
sentence_trans: 要想在街上保证安全，遵守交通规则十分重要！
word_etyma: ad加强 + her=here粘住 + ence名词词缀 → 一直粘住 → adherence坚守
